ml.alternet.security.auth

Class Hasher.HasherBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.security.auth.Hasher.HasherBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hasher.Builder, Hasher.Configuration
    Enclosing interface:
    Hasher

    @LookupKey(forClass=Hasher.Builder.class,
           byDefault=true)
public static class Hasher.HasherBuilder
extends Object
implements Hasher.Builder, Hasher.Configuration
    Default hasher builder implementation. For using a custom builder, simply specify a lookup key that won't be used by default.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

      • setLogRounds

        public Hasher.Builder setLogRounds(int logRounds)
        Set the log rounds for BCrypt.
        Specified by:
        setLogRounds in interface Hasher.Builder
        Parameters:
        logRounds - For BCrypt algorithm only : the log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2**log_rounds.
        Returns:
        This builder.
